title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 44.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 44.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Paragraph (c) of subdivision 2 and subdivision 41 of
section
375
and
sections
100-a, 101, 106-a, 114-b, 115-a, 117-a, 117-b, 132-a, 1104
and
1144
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law govern the affixing, display and effect of
colored lights on vehicles, other than those required by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
44.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
